trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_SEQ_00<tab>Auphiliot would be most grateful if you could hunt down some Garlean interlopers in his stead.

TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_SEQ_01<tab>A number of the Garleans responsible for the disappearance of the sylph elder remain in the area. Investigate the specified locations, and vanquish any Garleans you come upon.
TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_SEQ_02<tab>The Garlean intruders are no more. Report your success to Auphiliot.
TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_SEQ_03<tab>Thanks to your efforts, the Garleans have been driven off, and a small measure of peace has returned to the Twelveswood. At least for the moment.
TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the specified locations and defeat Garleans.

TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_AUPHILIOT_000_000<tab>Yer back, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, an' somethin' tells me ye've not come for a flagon o' Buscarron's ale. All the better, that. I just overheard some Garlean stragglers was seen in the Twelveswood, an' ye know they're not like to be up to any good.

TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_AUPHILIOT_000_001<tab>Me? Why, I'd like nothin' more than to gut those imperial whoresons meself, but I fear I've─<var 1A 02 /var>hic<var 1A 01 /var>!─other...duties...to attend this day. We're countin' on ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!

TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_AUPHILIOT_000_010<tab>Saw to those Garlean dogs as swift an' sure as I saw to me pint o'─er, me <var 1A 02 /var>duties<var 1A 01 /var>, did ye? On behalf of old man Buscarron an' me compatriots here at the Druthers, ye have─<var 1A 02 /var>hurk<var 1A 01 /var>!─me gratitude, an' then some.

TEXT_GAIUSA310_00742_AUPHILIOT_000_011<tab>What with ye an' meself seein' to matters, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, I tell ye: no flagon o' mead or Garlean troublemaker on or around these premises is─<var 1A 02 /var>hic<var 1A 01 /var>─safe!
